variable.name: FAMILY
variable.description: Family identifier: value 1 means Family 1; value 2 means Family 2, et al.

variable.name: FATHER
variable.description: Father identifier (if available) within a family
variable.value: Person 2 in the same family is this person's father
Person 3 in the same family is this person's father

variable.name: MOTHER
variable.description: Mother identifier (if available) within a family
variable.value: Person 2 in the same family is this person's mother
Person 3 in the same family is this person's mother

variable.name: PERSON
variable.description: Individual identifier within a family: value 1 means Person 1 in certain family, et al.

variable.name: STUDY_ID
variable.description: Identifier within Collaborative Association Study of Psoriasis for trios
